text: Blacksburg is a town in Montgomery County, in western Virginia. In 2020, 44,826 people lived there. == History == Blacksburg was first explored by Henry Batt and John Fallam who were sent by Abraham Wood in 1671. The town is named after Samuel Black, who used to own land there. On October 2, 1872, Virginia Tech was opened with three teachers. On April 26, 2007, Seung-Hui Cho shot 32 people in the Virginia Tech massacre. title: Blacksburg, Virginia
